title: Fully updated 4 Bed house w/ Healthcare discount - 1 block to Cle Clin
posting_body: ["Welcome to this completely remodeled house that's one block from both the Cleveland Clinic and University Circle!", 'With all of the new construction in the area and Opportunity Corridor, this is such an exciting and convenient place to live!', 'Healthcare workers receive a $200/mo discount on rent for the first year.', 'Apply online now!', '<URL>', 'The open floor plan is perfect for entertaining, complete with granite countertops/island and brand-new stainless steel appliances.', 'The first floor conveniently includes a half bath and washer/dryer hookups.', 'The second floor offers a full bath with tiled showed and 3 bedrooms, with a walk-in closet for the master bedroom.', 'The entire third floor can serve as either a 4th bedroom or make it the perfect home office for your remote work.', 'The exterior has been freshly painted and is wired for cameras if added security is preferred.', 'We also have the house next door currently undergoing the same extensive renovations from floor-to-ceiling, so you can move in now and invite your colleague to be your neighbor.']
